name: RoadToNowhere
description: The project is not sufficiently planned and therefore takes place on an ad hoc basis with an uncertain outcome and deadline. There is no project plan in the project.

threshold.thresholdPrintName: Minimum number of wiki pages with project plan
threshold.thresholdErrorMess: Minimum number of wikipages must be positive integer number

threshold.thresholdPrintName: Minimum number of activities with project plan
threshold.thresholdErrorMess: Minimum number of activities must be positive integer number

threshold.thresholdDescription: Substring that will be search in wikipages and activities
threshold.thresholdErrorMess: Maximum number of substrings is ten and must not starts and ends with characters ||
